Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute at Woodlawn/93rd
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Cottage Grove and resume regular route: due to, street blockage near Woodlawn/93rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Delays Affecting O'Hare-bound Blue Line Trains
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion after earlier signal problems near Belmont. Crews working to restore normal service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays and congestion after earlier signal problems near Belmont.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Crews are working to clear the congestion that's formed/correct the problem and restore normal travel times through the area.

Allow extra travel time.
